Afade (Afaɗə) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa na n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Cameroon.
Afade bụ onye otu Biu-Mandara nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic
Ọ nwere njikọ na asụsụ Cameroon Mpade, Maslam, Malgbe, Mser, na Lagwan.
Ndị na-asụ Afade bụ ụmụ amaala Kotoko nke Cameroon na Naijiria
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, na Cameroon, a na-asụ ya na mpaghara North dị anya: Logone-and-Chari ọke, South Makari nkewa, Afade area
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ a bụ ndị Cameroon 6,700
Na Na Naịjirịa, ndị na-ekwu okwu 40,000 na-asụ Afade na Borno Steeti, Ngala LGA, obodo nta iri na abụọ
Na Cameroon, a na-asụ Afade n'akụkụ ndịda nke obodo Makari, nke dị n'etiti obodo Afade ma gbasaa na Logone-Birni (Logone-et-Chari department, Far North region)
A na-asụ ya karịsịa na Naijiria.
Afade nwere nnukwu ndepụta nke ụdaume, gụnyere ejectives, implosives, na labial-velar stops
Mkpụrụedemede nke Afade bụ /i u e ɤ o ɛ ɔ a ɑ/
